com.feilong.core.util

Class MapUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.core.util.MapUtil

  • public final class MapUtil
extends Object
    Map工具类.

    hashCode与equals:

    hashCode重要么?
    不重要,对于List集合、数组而言,他就是一个累赘,但是对于HashMap、HashSet、HashTable而言,它变得异常重要.

    在Java中hashCode的实现总是伴随着equals,他们是紧密配合的,你要是自己设计了其中一个,就要设计另外一个。

    整个处理流程是:
    1. 判断两个对象的hashcode是否相等,若不等,则认为两个对象不等,完毕,若相等,则比较equals。
    2. 若两个对象的equals不等,则可以认为两个对象不等,否则认为他们相等。

    关于 Map:

    interface/class 说明
    Map
    1. An object that maps keys to values.
    2. A map cannot contain duplicate keys
    3. Takes the place of the Dictionary class
    HashMap
    1. Hash table based implementation of the Map interface.
    2. permits null values and the null key.
    3. makes no guarantees as to the order of the map

    扩容:

    1. HashMap 初始容量 HashMap.DEFAULT_INITIAL_CAPACITY是16,DEFAULT_LOAD_FACTOR 是0.75 java.util.HashMap#addEntry 是 2 * table.length 2倍
    LinkedHashMap
    1. Hash table and linked list implementation of the Map interface,
    2. with predictable iteration order.
    Note that: insertion order is not affected if a key is re-inserted into the map.
    TreeMap
    1. A Red-Black tree based NavigableMap implementation
    2. sorted according to the natural ordering of its keys, or by a Comparator.
    Hashtable
    1. This class implements a hashtable, which maps keys to values.
    2. synchronized.
    3. Any non-null object can be used as a key or as a value.
    Properties
    1. The Properties class represents a persistent set of properties.
    2. can be saved to a stream or loaded from a stream.
    3. Each key and its corresponding value in the property list is a string.
    IdentityHashMap
    1. using reference-equality in place of object-equality when comparing keys (and values).
    2. 使用==代替equals()对key进行比较的散列表.专为特殊问题而设计的

    注意:此类不是 通用 Map 实现！它有意违反 Map 的常规协定,此类设计仅用于其中需要引用相等性语义的罕见情况

    WeakHashMap
    1. A hashtable-based Map implementation with weak keys.
    2. 它对key实行"弱引用",如果一个key不再被外部所引用,那么该key可以被GC回收
    EnumMap
    1. A specialized Map implementation for use with enum type keys.
    2. Enum maps are maintained in the natural order of their keys
    3. 不允许空的key
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    feilong
    See Also:
    AbstractMap.SimpleEntry, MapUtils

    • Method Detail

      • putIfValueNotNull

        public static <K,V> void putIfValueNotNull(Map<K,V> map,
                                           K key,
                                           V value)
        仅当 null != map && null != value才将key/value put到map中.
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map to add to, may not be null
        key - the key
        value - the value
        Since:
        1.4.0
        See Also:
        MapUtils.safeAddToMap(Map, Object, Object)

      • putSumValue

        public static <K> void putSumValue(Map<K,Integer> map,
                                   K key,
                                   Integer value)
        如果map中存在key,那么累加value值;如果不存在那么直接put.

        如果map是null,那么抛出异常

        示例:

         
 Map<String, Integer> map = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
 MapUtil.putSumValue(map, "1000001", 5);
 MapUtil.putSumValue(map, "1000002", 5);
 MapUtil.putSumValue(map, "1000002", 5);
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(map));
        返回: 
         {
        "1000001": 5,
        "1000002": 10
        }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        key - the key
        value - the value
        Since:
        1.5.5
        See Also:
        MutableInt, most-efficient-way-to- increment-a-map-value-in-java, "java.util.Map#getOrDefault(Object, Object)", HashBag

      • getMinValue

        public static <K,T extends Number & Comparable<? super T>> T getMinValue(Map<K,T> map,
                                                                         K... keys)
        指定一个map,指定特定的keys,取得其中的 value 最小值.

        示例:

         Map<String, Integer> map = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
 
 map.put("a", 3007);
 map.put("b", 3001);
 map.put("c", 3002);
 map.put("d", 3003);
 map.put("e", 3004);
 map.put("f", 3005);
 map.put("g", -1005);
 
 LOGGER.info("" + MapUtil.getMinValue(map, "a", "b", "d", "g", "m"));
        返回: -1005
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        map - 指定一个map
        keys - 指定特定的key
        Returns:
        • 如果 map 是null或者empty,返回 null;
        • 如果 keys 是null或者empty,返回map所有value的最小值
        • 如果循环的 key不在map key里面,则返回的map中忽略该key,并输出warn level log
        • 如果 keys 中的所有的key 都不在 map 中出现 ,那么返回null
        See Also:
        getSubMap(Map, Object...), Collections.min(Collection)

      • getSubMap

        @SafeVarargs
public static <K,T> Map<K,T> getSubMap(Map<K,T> map,
                                                     K... keys)
        获得 一个map 中的 按照指定的key 整理成新的map.

        注意:如果循环的 key不在map key里面,则返回的map中忽略该key,并输出warn level log

        返回的map为 LinkedHashMap,key的顺序 按照参数 keys的顺序

        示例:

         Map<String, Integer> map = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
 map.put("a", 3007);
 map.put("b", 3001);
 map.put("c", 3001);
 map.put("d", 3003);
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(MapUtil.getSubMap(map, "a", "c")));
        返回: 
         {
      "a": 3007,
      "c": 3001
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        keys - 如果循环的 key不在map key里面,则返回的map中忽略该key,并输出warn level log
        Returns:
        • 如果 map 是null或者empty,返回 Collections.emptyMap();
        • 如果 keys 是null或者empty,返回 map
        • 如果循环的 key不在map key里面,则返回的map中忽略该key,并输出warn level log

      • getSubMapExcludeKeys

        @SafeVarargs
public static <K,T> Map<K,T> getSubMapExcludeKeys(Map<K,T> map,
                                                                K... excludeKeys)
        获得 sub map(去除不需要的keys).

        返回值为 LinkedHashMap,key的顺序 按照参数 map的顺序

        示例:

         Map<String, Integer> map = new LinkedHashMap<String, Integer>();
 
 map.put("a", 3007);
 map.put("b", 3001);
 map.put("c", 3002);
 map.put("g", -1005);
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(MapUtil.getSubMapExcludeKeys(map, "a", "g", "m")));
        返回: 
         {
 "b": 3001,
 "c": 3002
 }

        如果 excludeKeys中含有 map 中不存在的key,将会输出warn级别的log

        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        excludeKeys - the keys
        Returns:
        • 如果 map 是null或者empty,返回 Collections.emptyMap();
        • 如果 excludeKeys 是null或者empty, return map
        Since:
        1.0.9

      • invertMap

        public static <K,V> Map<V,K> invertMap(Map<K,V> map)
        map的key和value互转.

        这个操作map预先良好的定义.如果传过来的map,不同的key有相同的value,那么返回的map(key)只会有一个(value),其他重复的key被丢掉了

        示例:

         Map<String, Integer> map = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
 map.put("a", 3007);
 map.put("b", 3001);
 map.put("c", 3001);
 map.put("d", 3003);
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(MapUtil.invertMap(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "3001": "c",
 "3007": "a",
 "3003": "d"
 }
        可以看出 b元素被覆盖了
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        如果map是null,抛出异常
        如果map是empty,返回 一个 new HashMap
        Since:
        1.2.2
        See Also:
        MapUtils.invertMap(Map)

      • extractSubMap

        public static <K,O,V> Map<K,V> extractSubMap(Map<K,O> map,
                                             String extractPropertyName,
                                             Class<K> keysClass)
        以参数 map的key为key,以参数 map value的 指定extractPropertyName属性值为值,拼装成新的map返回.

        如果在抽取的过程中,map没有某个 includeKeys,将会输出 warn log

        示例:

         Map<Long, User> map = new LinkedHashMap<Long, User>();
 map.put(1L, new User(1L));
 map.put(2L, new User(2L));
 map.put(53L, new User(3L));
 map.put(5L, new User(5L));
 map.put(6L, new User(6L));
 map.put(4L, new User(4L));
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(MapUtil.extractSubMap(map, "id", Long.class)));
        返回: 
         {
 "1": 1,
 "2": 2,
 "4": 4,
 "5": 5,
 "6": 6,
 "53": 3
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        O - the generic type
        V - the generic type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        extractPropertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        keysClass - map key 的class 类型
        Returns:
        • 如果 map 是null或者empty,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        • 如果 extractPropertyName 是null或者empty,抛出 NullPointerException
        • 抽取map value 的 extractPropertyName属性值,拼装成新的map返回
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • extractSubMap

        public static <K,O,V> Map<K,V> extractSubMap(Map<K,O> map,
                                             K[] includeKeys,
                                             String extractPropertyName,
                                             Class<K> keysClass)
        以参数 map的key为key(key需要在 includeKeys范围内),以参数 map value的 指定extractPropertyName 属性值为值,拼装成新的map返回.

        如果在抽取的过程中,map没有某个 includeKeys,将会输出 warn log

        示例:

         Map<Long, User> map = new LinkedHashMap<Long, User>();
 map.put(1L, new User(1L));
 map.put(2L, new User(2L));
 map.put(53L, new User(3L));
 map.put(5L, new User(5L));
 map.put(6L, new User(6L));
 map.put(4L, new User(4L));
 Long[] includeKeys = { 5L, 4L };
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(MapUtil.extractSubMap(map, includeKeys, "id", Long.class)));
        返回: 
         {
 "5": 5
 "4": 4
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        includeKeys - the include keys
        extractPropertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        keysClass - map key 的class 类型
        Returns:
        • 如果 map 是null或者empty,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        • 如果 extractPropertyName 是null或者empty,抛出 NullPointerException
        • 如果 includeKeys 是null或者empty, then will extract map total keys
        • 抽取map value 的 extractPropertyName属性值,拼装成新的map返回
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • sortByKeyAsc

        public static <K,V> Map<K,V> sortByKeyAsc(Map<K,V> map)
        按照key asc顺序排序.

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new HashMap<String, Comparable>();
 
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put("b", 8);
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(MapUtil.sortByKeyAsc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "a": 123,
 "b": 8,
 "c": 345
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,抛出 NullPointerException
        Since:
        1.2.0
        See Also:
        TreeMap.TreeMap(Map)

      • sortByKeyDesc

        public static <K,V> Map<K,V> sortByKeyDesc(Map<K,V> map)
        按照key desc 倒序排序.

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new HashMap<String, Comparable>();
 
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put("b", 8);
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(MapUtil.sortByKeyDesc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "c": 345,
 "b": 8,
 "a": 123
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        如果 map是 null,抛出 NullPointerException
        Since:
        1.2.0
        See Also:
        ReverseComparator.ReverseComparator(Comparator), PropertyComparator.PropertyComparator(String)

      • sortByValueAsc

        public static <K,V extends Comparable<V>> Map<K,V> sortByValueAsc(Map<K,V> map)
        根据value 来顺序排序(asc).

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new HashMap<String, Comparable>();
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put("b", 8);
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(MapUtil.sortByValueAsc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "b": 8,
 "a": 123,
 "c": 345
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        the map< k, v>
        Since:
        1.2.0
        See Also:
        PropertyComparator.PropertyComparator(String), Map.Entry, sortByValueDesc(Map)

      • sortByValueDesc

        public static <K,V extends Comparable<V>> Map<K,V> sortByValueDesc(Map<K,V> map)
        根据value 来倒序排序(desc).

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new LinkedHashMap<String, Comparable>();
 
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put("b", 8);
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(MapUtil.sortByValueDesc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "c": 345,
 "a": 123,
 "b": 8
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        the map< k, v>
        Since:
        1.2.0
        See Also:
        ReverseComparator.ReverseComparator(Comparator), PropertyComparator.PropertyComparator(String), sortByValueAsc(Map)

      • sort

        public static <K,V> Map<K,V> sort(Map<K,V> map,
                                  Comparator<Map.Entry<K,V>> mapEntryComparator)
        使用 基于 Entry 的 mapEntryComparator 来对 map进行排序.

        由于是对Entry排序的, 既可以按照key来排序,也可以按照value来排序哦

        示例:

        比如有以下的map 
         Map<String, Integer> map = new HashMap<String, Integer>();
 
 map.put("a13", 123);
 map.put("a2", 345);
 map.put("a8", 8);
        如果我们只是使用 : 
         LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(MapUtil.sortByKeyAsc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "a13": 123,
 "a2": 345,
 "a8": 8
 }
        此时可以看出 a13是以字符串的形式进行比较的,我们可以使用以下的自定义的 Comparator,来达到排序的效果 
         PropertyComparator<Entry<String, Integer>> propertyComparator = new PropertyComparator<Map.Entry<String, Integer>>(
                 "key",
                 new RegexGroupNumberComparator("a(\\d*)"));
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(MapUtil.sort(map, propertyComparator)));
        返回: 
         {
 "a2": 345,
 "a8": 8,
 "a13": 123
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        mapEntryComparator - 基于 Entry 的 Comparator
        Returns:
        如果map是null,抛出异常
        如果mapEntryComparator是null,抛出异常
        Since:
        1.2.0
        See Also:
        Collections.sort(List, Comparator)
